images.copyright: Wild baby rabbits in spring (© Fiona McAllister Photography/Getty Images)
images.title: The Easter Bunny is coming to town
images.caption: Happy Easter!
images.desc: Today is a special day for billions of Christians worldwide—a time of renewal, celebration, and traditions. Easter, also called Pascha or Resurrection Sunday, commemorates the resurrection of Jesus Christ as described in the New Testament. It's also a time for festive traditions, from sunrise services to Easter egg hunts and, of course, the beloved Easter Bunny.
images.bsTitle: The Easter Bunny is coming to town
